doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/GS TMT SPEC SALES_ Wise Platforms deepdive; US telcos change of coverage; Inpost what will investors focus on_ 高盛 TMT 专项销售：深入解析 Wise Platforms ；美国电信运营_2025-09-02

passages.text: GS TMT SPEeSALES: Wise Platforms depepdiv; US telcos change of coverage; Inpost what will investors focus on?
高盛 TMT 专项销售：深入解析 Wise Platforms；美国电信运营商覆盖范围变动；Inpost 投资者将关注什么？

With the US out overnight slightly quieter however China tech/data- center/Al/smartphone- supply complex traded heavy (several bellwethers off \(\sim 2 - 5\%\) ) but feels like follow on from Friday weakness in NDX (had the September seasonality mentioned several times). In US Telcos Michael Ng is taking on coverage as Jim focuses more on semis and IT service. In Semis Trendforce research indicated that TSMC mkt share topped \(70\%\) for chips manufacturing for the first time, widening the gap between #2 Samsung, whose share has dropped to \(7.3\%\) .

隔夜美国市场相对平静，但中国科技/数据中心/人工智能/智能手机供应链板块承压（多只龙头股下跌约 \(2 - 5\%\) ）- ，感觉是延续了周五NDX的疲弱表现（九月季节性因素已多次被提及）。在美国电信板块：Michael Ng 将接手覆盖工作，而Jim将更多专注于半导体和IT服务。在半导体方面，Tendforce的研究显示，台积电芯片制造市场份额首次突破 \(70\%\) ，与排名第二的三星差距进一步拉大，三星的市场份额已降至 \(7.3\%\) 。

WISE Mo reiterates his Buy rating for Wise ahead of its key customer event focused on 站s Platforms business, Wise Connect in San Francisco on 10 Sept with a detailed c40pg note looking at different scenarios for Platforms out to 2040 and key debates like Stablecoin. Wise is at Communacopia + Technology 2025 next week.
WISE 的 Mo 在其关键客户活动前重申对 Wise 的买入评级，该活动将于 9 月 10 日在旧金山举行，聚焦其平台业务 Wise Connect，并发布了一份约 40 页的详细报告，探讨平台业务到 2040 年的不同情景，以及稳定币等关键争论话题。Wise 将于下周参加 Communacopia + Technology 2025 大会。

Inpost called up to start but can see debate both ways as small miss on volumes while revenues and margins beats. Will be interesting to see how it trades as Investors have historically focused on polish volumes but today's price action will tell whether they can see past that to the broader eurozone strategy or if their core market is still a sticking point. The 3Q guide is a re- acceleration which helps. Given the recent weakness, I would expect flat to small +ve
Inpost开盘上涨，但市场观点分歧，一方面包裹量略低于预期，另一方面收入和利润率超预期。投资者过去一直关注波兰的包裹量，今天的股价走势将显示他们是否能将目光转向更广泛的欧元区战略，还是核心市场仍是关注焦点。第三季度指引显示增长重新加速，这是一大利好。鉴于近期的疲软，我预计股价将持平或小幅上涨。
Index changes: NOKIA is to be deleted from the Euro Stoxx 50 Index and ZEGONA to be added to the Stoxx Europe 600 index both effective Sept. 22
指数变动：NOKIA将从EuroStoxx50指数中剔除，ZEGONA将被纳入StoxxEurope600指数，均于9月22日生效。
Amadeus IT Group | Fireside Chat with CEO & CFO | 04 September 130 to register Amadeus IT Group | 与 CEO 和 CFO 的炉边谈话 | 9 月 4 日 13:30 注册
AWAY FROM GS: NOD downgraded to sell from neutral at UBS.
非高盛消息：UBS将NOD的评级从中性下调至卖出。
GS toolkit: Franchise 360 – one-stop shop for signing up to Sector Specialists & thought leader distros from around the firm |
高盛工具包：Franchise 360 —— 一站式平台，可订阅公司各领域专家及思想领袖的资讯分发 |

- WISE Mo reiterates his Buy rating for Wise (on Conviction List) ahead of its key customer event focused on its Platforms business, Wise Connect in San Francisco on 10 Sept with a detailed c40pg note looking at different scenarios for Platforms out to 2040 and key debates like Stablecoin. He continues to see Platforms as a large, undereappreciated opportunity, where Wise has reached an inflection point with key recent wins (such as Nubank, Standard Chartered and Morgan Stanley). In his base case, he assumes the ramp up of existing partners only and his two upside scenarios assume 1) mid-term upside where he sees a faster ramp of existing partners (6-14% PBT accretion vs base case 2026-2030), and 2) long-term upside scenario where he assumes the faster ramp of existing plus future wins to 2040E (c12-30% PBT accretion). Mo's base case is already c5-20% ahead of consensus 2028-2030E underlying net income with upside risk to this in his view. He also looks at a reverse DCF to estimate that the share price is discounting low teens sales growth (vs. GSe of c16%) over the next decade which he thinks is undemanding.

在9月10日于旧金山举行、聚焦其平台业务Wise Connect的重要客户活动之前，Mo重申了对Wise的“买入”评级（列入确信名单），并发布了一份约40页的详细报告，探讨了平台业务到2040年的不同情景，以及诸如稳定币等关键争论。他依然认为平台业务是一个巨大且被低估的机会，Wise已凭借近期的重要合作（如Nubank、渣打银行和摩根士丹利）到达了拐点。在他的基准情景中，仅假设现有合作伙伴的业务逐步提升；而在两个上行情景中，他假设：1）中期上行情景，即现有合作伙伴的业务提升速度更快（2026- 2030年税前利润较基准情景增加6- 14%）；2）长期上行情景，即现有合作伙伴更快提升并新增未来合作至2040年（税前利润增加约12- 30%）。Mo的基准情景对2028- 2030年的基础净利润预期已比市场一致预期高出约5- 20%，他认为还有进一步上行的可能。他还通过反向DCF估算，当前股价隐含的未来十年销售增长率为低双位数（相比高盛预期的约16%），他认为这一假设并不苛刻。
Next catalysts: Wise is at 1) Communacopia + Technology 2025 next week and 2) Wise Connect in San Francisco on 10th September a key customer event focused on Wise Platforms.
下一个催化剂：Wise将于下周参加1）Communacopia + Technology 2025，以及2）9月10日在旧金山举办的Wise Connect，这是一个以Wise Platforms为重点的重要客户活动。

While in the FT today there is an article on British fintechs stepping up plans to buy US banks as regulators signal a more relaxed approach to mergers under the Trump administration. UK digital banks Revolut and Starling are weighing acquisitions of nationally chartered banks in the US, which would allow them to be granted American banking licences and lend across all 50 states. (FT)
《金融时报》今日报道称，英国金融科技公司正加快收购美国银行的计划，因为监管机构在特朗普政府下对并购表现出更宽松的态度。英国数字银行Revolut和Starling正在考虑收购在美国拥有全国性牌照的银行，这将使它们能够获得美国银行牌照，并在全部50个州开展贷款业务。（FT）
- Also worth flagging per Bloomberg that Revolut Begins Secondary Share Sale at \(\) 75\(Billion Valuation..\)
另据彭博社报道，Revolut以750亿美元估值启动二级股票出售。

- SEMIS: Samsung Electronics will resume its investment in the foundry plant in Taylor, Texas. The previous delays caused by customer confirmation issues have reportedly been resolve.As per previous reports, Tesla has signed a \(\) 16.5\$ billion contract with Samsung for the production of its Al6 chips, with Musk clarifying that \(\) 16.5\$ billion is actually just the bare minimum. Source
半导体：三星电子将恢复在德克萨斯州泰勒市晶圆厂的投资。据报道，之前因客户确认问题导致的延迟已得到解决。根据此前报道，特斯拉已与三星签署了一份价值165亿美元的合同，用于生产其Al6芯片，马斯克澄清称165亿美元实际上只是最低金额。来源

- US TELCO & Cable coverage change Michael Ng is taking on coverage of the sector as Jim focuses more on semis and IT service. He takes on AT&T (T, Buy), T-Mobile (TMUS, Buy), Verizon (VZ, Buy), Charter (CHTR, Sell), Altice (ATUS, Sell), Cogent (CCOI, Neutral), Lumen (LUMN, Neutral), and Frontier (FYBR, Not Rated).
美国电信及有线电视行业覆盖变动：Michael Ng 将接手该行业的覆盖工作，而 Jim 将更多专注于半导体和 IT 服务。他将负责覆盖 AT&T（T，买入）、T- Mobile（TMUS，买入）、Verizon（VZ，买入）、Charter（CHTR，卖出）、Altice（ATUS，卖出）、Cogent（CCOI，中性）、Lumen（LUMN，中性）以及 Frontier（FYBR，未评级）。

Michael expects 2026 will likely be a pivotal year for the US telecom and cable sectors given heightened competition in consumer connectivity services (i.e., wireless and wireline). Unlike in years past where competitive responses were largely through plan pricing and wireless handset promotions, we are seeing more competitive activity through wireless and wireline bundling ("convergence"), network leadership & modernization efforts, and price- value offerings including third party services (e.g., streaming, AI). Our Buy ratings on AT&T (T) and T- Mobile (TMUS) reflect our view that their investments in network modernization, spectrum, and brand will help drive the most attractive financial returns including industry leading (1) EBITDA growth; (2) free cash flow conversion; and (3) shareholder capital returns – which justify their premium EV/EBITDA valuation multiples. Our Buy rating on Verizon (VZ) is out- of- consensus, in our view; despite some tactical caution related to 3Q25E phone net additions, our positive view reflects upside to consumer wireless service revenue on waning promotional amortization headwinds and Perks contributing \(\sim 100\) bps to growth, as well the potential for better- than- expected cost & revenue synergies from the proposed acquisition of Frontier.

Michael 预计，2026 年可能会成为美国电信和有线电视行业的关键一年，因为消费者连接服务（即无线和有线）的竞争加剧。与过去主要通过套餐定价和无线手机促销来应对竞争不同，我们现在看到更多通过无线与有线捆绑（“融合”）、网络领先与现代化建设，以及包含第三方服务（如流媒体、人工智能）的价格- 价值方案来展开的竞争活动。我们对 AT&T（T）和 T- Mobile（TMUS）的“买入”评级反映了我们的观点，即它们在网络现代化、频谱和品牌方面的投资将有助于带来最具吸引力的财务回报，包括行业领先的（1）EBITDA 增长；（2）自由现金流转化率；以及（3）股东资本回报——这些都支撑了它们的企业价值/EBITDA 估值溢价倍数。我们认为，我们对 Verizon（VZ）的“买入”评级与市场普遍观点不一致；尽管针对 2025 年第三季度手机净新增用户数存在一些战术性谨慎，但我们的积极观点反映了消费者无线服务收入的上行潜力，这得益于促销摊销阻力的减弱以及 Perks 对增长贡献约 100 个基点，同时拟收购 Frontier 可能带来好于预期的成本和收入协同效应。

- **Altice Restructuring: Interim Suspension Requested by Trade Unions**(UNSA and CFDT) to Take Place on September 4 (Alloforfait). On August 4, the Paris Economic Activities Court validated the restructuring plan of Altice France. The unions will defend in summary proceedings the suspension of the judgment of the court and if the judges follow the request, an appeal on the merits can then be launched. Currently the restructuring is expected on October 1 and the unions fear that it could have an impact on employment.
Altice 重组：工会（UNSA 和 CFDT）请求于 9 月 4 日进行临时中止（Alloforfait）。8 月 4 日，巴黎经济活动法院批准了 Altice France 的重组计划。工会将在简易程序为中止法院判决进行辩护，如果法官支持该请求，则可随后对案件实质提出上诉。目前重组预计于 10 月 1 日进行，工会担心这可能会对就业产生影响。

INPOST- Q2 Rev at 3.53b 1% ahead of street with volumes slightly light, Adj Ebitda inline at 999.5m. Poland volumes growth of \(6\%\) was below expectations (vs. \(+9\% / + 8\%\) vs GSe/Cons), although we note stronger performance of APMs volumes within the mix, offset by lower to- door \((+5\%)\) , and InPost flags higher APM adoption of International marketplaces. Within the Poland volumes mix, non- marketplaces (excl. top- 5 marketplaces) volumes grew \(17\%\) .

InPost 第二季度营收为 35.3 亿，比市场预期高 \(1\%\) ，但包裹量略低，调整后 EBITDA 为 9.995 亿，符合预期。波兰包裹量增长 \(6\%\) ，低于预期（相比高盛/市场一致预期的 \(+9\% / + 8\%\) ），不过我们注意到其中自助包裹柜（APM）包裹量表现更强，抵消了送货上门 \((+5\%)\) 的较低增速，同时 InPost 指出国际电商平台的 APM 采用率更高。在波兰包裹量结构中，非电商平台（不含前五大电商平台）包裹量增长了 \(17\%\) .

On 3Q25 outlook, Poland volumes growth expected to go back at high- single- digit (vs. GS/Cons: \(+10\% / + 9\%\) ), continuing to outpace the recovering eCommerce market in 3Q25. International volume growing c. \(70\%\) which incl. consolidation of Yodel from May \((+76\% GSe / + 60\% V\) Cons). At the Group level, volume growth is expected in the high- twenties % YoY range (vs. GSe/Cons \(+33\% /27\%\) ).

关于 2025 年第三季度展望，预计波兰包裹量增速将回到高个位数水平（相比高盛/市场一致预期的 \(+10\% / + 9\%\) ），继续跑赢 2025 年第三季度正在复苏的电商市场。国际包裹量预计增长约 \(70\%\) ，其中包括自 5 月起并表的 Yodel（高盛预期 \(+76\%\) /市场一致预期 \(+60\%\) ）。集团层面，包裹量预计同比增长在高二十个百分点区间（相比高盛/市场一致预期的 \(+33\% / + 27\%\) ）。

2025 Group outlook reiterated, revised slightly down for Poland volumes / increased for Poland Adj.EBITDA margin: Poland volumes expected to grow high single- digit (GS/Cons: \(+10\% / + 10\%\) ; vs. high single- digit to low double- digit before), exceeding market growth, yet landing within that range depending on eCommerce market development in 2H25. Revenue expected to grow slightly above volume due to mix and repricing (GS/Cons: \(+13\% / + 11\%\) ). Adj. EBITDA margin expected to stabilize at high 40s (vs. mid- 40s before; GS/Cons: \(48.0\% /46.5\%\) ). See GIR take

重申 2025 年集团展望，略微下调波兰业务量预期 / 上调波兰调整后 EBITDA 利润率预期：预计波兰业务量将实现高个位数增长（高盛/市场一致预期： \(+10\% / + 10\%\) ；此前为高个位数至低双位数），增速将超过市场增长，但具体落点取决于 2025 年下半年电商市场的发展。预计收入增速将略高于业务量增速，受产品组合和重新定价推动（高盛/市场一致预期： \(+13\% / + 11\%\) ）。预计调整后 EBITDA 利润率将稳定在 \(40\%\) 高位（此前为 \(40\%\) 中位；高盛/市场一致预期： \(48.0\% /46.5\%\) ）。详见 GIR 观点。

Evolution and Pragmatic Play exit Stake.us in California: The exit of the suppliers comes after the City of Los Angeles filed a civil enforcement action against Stake.us and several of its providers, alleging the sweepstakes casino operation represented illegal gambling. Alongside the suppliers themselves, Evolution's Nolimit City, Red Tiger, Big Time Gaming and NetEnt studios were all also named in the lawsuit. It comes as California's sweepstake casino ban AB 831, which if passed would impose

criminal penalties on businesses providing support for the platforms including iGaming suppliers, advanced out of the Senate Appropriations Committee and towards the Senate floor for a full vote. Would note that the targeting of suppliers to combat grey or black market gambling operators is a tactic increasingly favoured by regulators. The UK's Gambling Commission announced an investigation into Evolution in December 2024 after it identified the provider's games available to operators without a valid GB licence. In response EVO introducing new ring- fencing across Europe to prevent this activity taking place, leading to a fall in revenue.

Evolution 和 Pragmatic Play 退出加州 Stake.us: 在洛杉矶市对 Stake.us 及其多家供应商提起民事执法诉讼，指控其抽奖赌场运营构成非法赌博后，这些供应商宣布退出。除供应商本身外，Evolution 旗下的 Nolimit City、Red Tiger、Big Time Gaming 和 NetEnt 工作室也均被列入诉讼名单。此事发生之际，加州的抽奖赌场禁令法案 AB 831 已从参议院拨款委员会推进至参议院全体表决阶段，该法案一旦通过，将对为这些平台提供支持的企业（包括 iGaming 供应商）施加刑事处罚。值得注意的是，针对供应商以打击灰色或黑市赌博运营商，正成为监管机构日益青睐的策略。英国博彩委员会在 2024 年 12 月宣布对 Evolution 展开调查，原因是发现该供应商的游戏向未持有有效英国牌照的运营商提供。作为回应，EVO 在欧洲引入了新的隔离措施以防止此类行为发生，导致其收入下降。
- Had a few clients flagging NDX Seasonality in September – its not great despite it been conference season with lots of datapoints....
有几位客户指出 NDX 在九月份的季节性表现——尽管正值会议季，有大量数据点，但表现并不理想......
FINTECH/PAYMENTS 金融科技/支付

- NVIDIA GTC is set at 16th March 2026 where pundits expect Rubin GPU and Vera CPU to be introduced along with humanoid robot and self-drive car. Taiwan local news pointing out that Rubin GPU's power consumption will increase from 1.4kW in the B300 chip to 2.3kW, exceeding the market estimate of 1.8kW. The VR200 rack's overall power supply (PSU) configuration is expected to cost up to \$104k USD, and the VR200 rack is expected to use an 18kW PSU. Now the 800V HVDC architecture pioneered by NVIDIA, and the ±400V DC system promoted by Google and the Open Compute Project are two major solution. Although whether 800V can become an industry standard remains to be seen, the trend is gradually taking shape, and in the future it may form a "dual track" corresponding to different computing platforms and application scenarios. Delta 2308 TT is the market leader as key beneficiary, while Lite On 2301 TT also has some exposure to NVDA 800V HVDC.

NVIDIA GTC 定于 2026 年 3 月 16 日举行，业内人士预计将发布 Rubin GPU 和 Vera CPU，以及类人机器人和自动驾驶汽车。台湾本地新闻指出，Rubin GPU 的功耗将从 B300 芯片的 1.4kW 提升至 2.3kW，超过市场预估的 1.8kW。VR200 机架的整体电源供应（PSU）配置预计成本高达 10.4 万美元，且 VR200 机架预计将采用 18kW 电源供应。当前，NVIDIA 首创的 800V HVDC 架构，以及 Google 与 Open Compute Project 推广的 ±400V DC 系统，是两大主要解决方案。虽然 800V 能否成为行业标准仍有待观察，但趋势正逐渐成形，未来可能形成对应不同计算平台和应用场景的“双轨制”。台达电（Delta）2308 TT 是市场领导者并为主要受益者，而光宝科技（Lite On）2301 TT 也在 NVDA 800V HVDC 领域有所布局。
- US SEMI: Samsung plans to start constructing its 2nm fab in the US for the Tesla deal, targeting to enter mass production in 2H26. (ED)
美国半导体：三星计划在美国为特斯拉项目建设 2nm 晶圆厂，目标是在 2026 年下半年进入量产阶段。(ED)

- Inventec (2356) is going to lead the assembly of AI servers using Alibaba's new AI chips in China per local news report. China aims to gradually replace the Nvidia products with self-made chips. (ED)
据当地新闻报道，英业达（2356）将在中国主导使用阿里巴巴新款 AI 芯片的 AI 服务器组装工作。中国的目标是逐步用自研芯片取代英伟达的产品。(ED)
- Power supply: local news pointing out that Rubin GPU's power consumption will increase from 1.4kW in the B300 chip to 2.3kW, exceeding the market estimate of

1.8kW. The VR200 rack's overall power supply (PSU) configuration is expected to cost up to \(\) 104k\(USD, and the VR200 rack is expected to use an 18kW PSU. Now the 800V HVDC architecture pioneered by NVIDIA, and the\) \pm 400V \(DC system promoted by Google and the Open Compute Project are two major solution. Although whether 800V can become an industry standard remains to be seen, the trend is gradually taking shape, and in the future it may form a "dual track" corresponding to different computing platforms and application scenarios. Delta 2308 TT is the market leader as key beneficiary, while Lite On 2301 TT also has some exposure to NVDA 800V HVDC.

电源供应：当地新闻指出，Rubin GPU 的功耗将从 B300 芯片的 1.4kW 提升至 2.3kW，超过市场预估的 1.8kW。VR200 机架的整体电源供应（PSU）配置成本预计高达 10.4 万美元，且 VR200 机架预计将采用 18kW 的 PSU。目前，英伟达率先采用的 800V HVDC 架构，以及由谷歌和 Open Compute Project 推动的 \(40W\) 直流系统，是两大主要解决方案。虽然 800V 能否成为行业标准仍有待观察，但趋势正在逐步形成，未来可能会针对不同的计算平台和应用场景形成“双轨制”。台达电（2308 TT）是市场领导者并为主要受益者，而光宝科技（2301 TT）也在英伟达 800V HVDC 领域有一定布局。
